serene.description: Photorealistic cinematic sequence set in a pristine serene showroom...
serene.lighting: controlled, high-end ambient lighting with soft spot highlights; background glows in neutral tones (white/silver/graphite) to emphasize the product shine
serene.environment: minimalist serene showroom with seamless white or metallic surfaces, ambient reflections, and subtle fog or mist to add dimensionality
